com.microblink.view

Class CameraViewGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.microblink.view.BaseCameraView
          • com.microblink.view.CameraViewGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecognizerView

    public abstract class CameraViewGroup
extends BaseCameraView
    A simple wrapper around a Camera and a SurfaceView that renders a centered preview of the Camera to the surface. We need to center the SurfaceView because not all devices have cameras that support preview sizes at the same aspect ratio as the device's display.

      • create

        public void create()
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraView
        Creates the view and its subviews and initializes camera settings. This method must be called in onCreate method of host activity. If not called, camera will not work. Make sure you set all your settings before calling this method.
        Overrides:
        create in class BaseCameraView
